args: Write-Host "Args received: $args"; Write-Host "Arg0: $($args[0])"; Write-Host "Arg1: $($args[1])"; try { $body = @{name=$args[0]; arguments=if($args[1]){$args[1]|ConvertFrom-Json}else{@{}}} | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10; Write-Host "Body: $body"; $r = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri http://172.27.85.131:8080/mcp/tools/call -Method POST -ContentType application/json -Body $body; Write-Host "Response: $($r | ConvertTo-Json)"; $r.result | ConvertTo-Json -Compress } catch { Write-Host "Error: $($_.Exception.Message)"; throw }
mcp-postgres-http.description: PostgreSQL MCP Server via HTTP - Debug Version
